meanings.definition: The quality or state of being separable.
meanings.sent1: The separablenesses of the puzzle pieces made it easy to put together.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the separablenesses of the compartments in this organizer.
meanings.sent3: The separablenesses of the twins often led to funny mix-ups.
meanings.sent4: Her mind had a clear separablenesses between work and play.
meanings.sent5: The separablenesses of the ingredients in the recipe ensured a delicious outcome.

meanings.definition: The ability to be separated or divided.
meanings.sent1: The separablenesses of the colors in the painting created a beautiful contrast.
meanings.sent2: I admire the separablenesses of the different flavors in this dish.
meanings.sent3: The separablenesses of the team members allowed for diverse perspectives.
meanings.sent4: The separablenesses of the notes in the melody added depth to the music.
meanings.sent5: The separablenesses of the tasks made it easier to delegate responsibilities.
